title: ISic003729. I.Sicily inscription 003729
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΑΠΟΛΛΟΔΩ[.. 1-2.]

Apparatus criticus

text of Meligunìs Lipára XII

translation

commentary

As noted in Meligunìs Lipára XII p.106 the name could in principle be masculine or feminine, nominative or genitive.

bibliography

  • 49.1305.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 12 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000541
